column4: hi guys - anyone good at proxies, vpns, hacking or wifi mesh & want to help keep intenet up in IRAN????? they need help
What kind of help is needed?
twotonespirit - the go there has killed internet !!! couple hundred ppl are feeding VPN, tor & proxies to em

also i started feeding info on WIFI mesh to IRAN - think it may be usefull - repeat Internet in Iran is out,  quote "ordinary ppl in Iran have no reliable info - gov is trying to break all communication routes  - #Iranelection"
